intro: Stenostomum microphyllum, commonly known as the small-leaved stenostomum, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many economically important plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are typically white or pale yellow and are arranged in clusters. Stenostomum microphyllum is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and along stream banks.
